description: This dataset contains molecular data (such as miRNA, RNA Seq) for the TARGET program for the hg38 genomic build. Clinical and biospecimen data for TARGET is contained in the TARGET_bioclin_v0 dataset. For more details about TARGET,  see  https://ocg.cancer.gov/programs/target. The official data repository for TARGET data is the NCI Genomic Data Commons at gdc.cancer.gov.
